Relevant Materials

  • Marco Masseroli, Giorgio Ghisalberti, Stefano Ceri - Bio Search Computing: Bioinformatics web service integration for data-driven answering of complex Life Science questions. International Conference on Computational Science, ICCS 2011 Singapore, 1-3 June, 2011
    • Slides
    • Relevant to: search, ranking, Functional Units.
  • SOA Governance by Antoon
  • Carole's CODATA talk 2008
  • Data Curation Continuum
  • The Bioinformatics Links Directory (http://www.bioinformatics.ca/links_directory/) does not describe or invoke the services but is a useful source for the catalogue.
  • MIBBI (http://www.mibbi.org/) is a registry of scientific experiment reporting guidelines with the idea to foster a foundry of best practice to further develop and encourage modular development and re-use of reporting guidelines.
  • SAWSDL is a W3C Recommendation that defines mechanisms using which semantic annotations can be added to Web Service Description Language document components as annotations.
  • myGrid ontology
  • EDAM
  • ISO standard
  • bioportal
  • propreo ontology
